title: upgrade jQuery to latest (1.4.3)
description: There are some nifty jQuery features we can take advantage of in the example app.

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content:
Here's a first cut at replacing jQuery 1.2.3 with 1.4.3. I looked for all the places where 1.2.3 was mentioned and upgraded (including licence statements), removed 1.2.3 and added 1.4.3 to webapp/web/admin.

I've done very cursory testing so far, debug.jsp comes up, I can look at the schema and the solr/browse page "looks ok".

No test are failing as a result of this patch.

Where should I test next?

comments.author: Erick Erickson
